description: All the flavours of a classic cheeseburger in a superb salad. Try this lighter burger salad with crunchy lettuce, juicy beef patties and burger sauce.
name: Cheeseburger Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tsp Woolworths extra virgin olive oil
500g Woolworths Angus Beef Burgers Sea Salt & Pepper

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large frying pan over medium heat. Add patties and Worcestershire sauce, then cook for 15 minutes, breaking up patties with a wooden spoon, or until browned and cooked through.
Meanwhile, to make the lighter burger sauce, combine all the ingredients in a small bowl. Season with pepper
Arrange lettuce, tomato, cheese, pickles and burger mince in bowls. Top with shallot and sesame seeds. Serve drizzled with burger sauce.
